All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BanishedZone
Represents a player's Banished Zone (also known as "Removed from Play") in Yu-Gi-Oh!
Board
Represents a player's game board/field in Yu-Gi-Oh!
Card
Abstract base class representing a Yu-Gi-Oh!
CardLoader
Utility class for loading Yu-Gi-Oh!
Deck
Represents a player's main deck in Yu-Gi-Oh!
DuelBoard
Main game board UI for Yu-Gi-Oh!
Effect
Represents a generic effect associated with a card in Yu-Gi-Oh!
ExtraDeck
Represents a player's Extra Deck in Yu-Gi-Oh!
Game
Represents a Yu-Gi-Oh!
Graveyard
Represents a player's Graveyard in Yu-Gi-Oh!
Hand
Represents a player's hand in Yu-Gi-Oh!
MainMenu
Main menu screen for the Yu-Gi-Oh!
MonsterCard
Represents a Monster Card in Yu-Gi-Oh!
MusicPlayer
Utility class for managing background music in the Yu-Gi-Oh!
Phase
Enumeration representing the different phases of a turn in Yu-Gi-Oh!
Player
Represents a player in a Yu-Gi-Oh!
Position
Enumeration representing the possible battle positions for monster cards in Yu-Gi-Oh!
SimpleBot
Simple AI bot for playing Yu-Gi-Oh!
SpellCard
Represents a Spell Card in Yu-Gi-Oh!
TrapCard
Represents a Trap Card in Yu-Gi-Oh!
